Articles.Content:
I just picked up Kerbal Space Program and I'm already hooked, I have a fair amount of flight sim experience and used to play around on Microsoft Space Simulator although some of the more recent space sims have been too complicated for me and I have found KSP to be a good medium between that and Star Wars-type physics.

My progress so far has been getting satellites up around Kerbin between 100-300,000m although I use up all my fuel in doing so and have to use up most of my RCR to set my orbits.
